abstract: Richard D. Parsons, Citigroup’s chairman, says his bank and other major financial institutions are integral to the economy and the United States’ influence around the world.
snippet: Richard D. Parsons, Citigroup’s chairman, says his bank and other major financial institutions are integral to the economy and the United States’ influence around the world.
lead_paragraph: Richard D. Parsons, the chairman of Citigroup, says his bank and other major financial institutions are part of the fabric of the economy and integral to the United States’ global power.

headline.main: Parsons Says Citi Too ‘Interwoven’ to Fail
